name: Black Flame
description:
Mapreador is a land full of magic that has recently fallen into chaos because of the awakening of an ancient evil.  Irreversible changes must be made  in order to prevent total destruction. 

Follow Oden as he is the one tasked with the fate of this world. 

This game was made for the Igmc2017 jam.
